sounds: I am so proud of my son Orshabaal.
Have you heard, the imperor is marrying an imp named April? What a fool.
The Ruthless Seven are going to make the easter bunny an honorary member!
They are coming ... perhaps for YOU!
Beware! The Ruthless Seven are coming!
Killing me is imp-ossible, because I am imp-roved! I am immune to any imp-act!
The one who kills me gets an imp-outfit.
Hey you! I've heard that! You're first to die when the masters come.
Nice to meet you. I am Harold, the ruthless herald.
Have you seen my friend Harvey? I could swear he's somewhere around.
My masters are on their way!
name: The Ruthless Herald
strategy: No strategy needed, as it doesn't do any damage nor can it be killed. Some players enjoy trapping it.
